label.requestTranslationTreeForAllLanguages: Translate all under {{displayName}} in all languages
label.dialogTitleAllProperties: Translate all properties to other languages
label.lock: content is locked in this language
label.errorContent: An error occurred when translating “{{property}}”. Ensure that the content is not locked or that you have sufficient permissions.
label.errorContentAllProperties: An error occurred when translating. Ensure that the content is not locked or that you have sufficient permissions.
label.warningAllProperties: Warning: all properties existing in the following languages ({{languages}}) will be translated from {{currentLanguage}}. This action cannot be undone. Please confirm your choice.
label.dialogDescriptionAllProperties: The values of all properties will be translated to all other languages, overwriting the current values.
